tool_description: An API showing all the disputes between Russia and Ukraine
name: Russia vs Ukraine
title: Russia vs Ukraine

api_list.name: Specific News Sources from the Russia - Ukraine Crises
api_list.description: Get specific news sources on the  Russia - Ukraine Crises
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://russia-vs-ukraine.p.rapidapi.com/news/NDTV"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russia-vs-ukraine.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://russia-vs-ukraine.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russia-vs-ukraine.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Russia - Ukraine Dispute News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all news about the Russia and Ukraine crises from all over the World.
